iati-activity.iati-identifier: IN-MCA-U74140WB1983PTC036093-Support to DEA for Infra projects

title.narrative: Providing support to Department of Economic Affairs DEA for Enhancing development and implementation of infrastructure projects through PPP

description.narrative: "The Foreign, Commonwealth and Department Office (FCDO) has set up an India: Infrastructure Policy Fund (I-IPF) as part of the development partnership with Government of India. Through the development fund, the FCDO deploys investment as well as provides technical assistance in its development cooperation programmes for India. As per the 2030 Roadmap jointly agreed between UK and India, financial cooperation is one of 33 areas identified for cooperation and technical assistance. Under this cooperation, the UK govt has agreed to establish the new UK-India Partnership on Infrastructure Finance and Policy, to support India’s ambitious plans of infrastructure development. In this context, FCDO has put together a technical assistance (TA) programme to support Government of India in improving business environment and capacities of public and private investors and developers in delivering infrastructure and related services. The proposed study is part of the FCDO’sTA programme with an objective to carry out a diagnostic study for PPP landscape of India."

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

description.narrative:
"Expenditure is being reported as aggregate of payments made by PwC to third parties for goods and services procured for the project during FY 22 quarter 3 (1st Oct to 31st Dec 2021).
Exchange rate as on last day of the quarter has been used to convert value from INR to GBP. Exchange rates have been used from FBIL* website.
*Financial Benchmarks India Private Limited (FBIL) has taken over from RBI, the computation and dissemination of reference rate for spot USD/INR and exchange rate of other major currencies with effect from July 10, 2018."
